TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. The Wishmaking Fairy doesn't see your wish anymore and thinks herself must have made a mistake. Your wish is undone.

I wish that my heart had deadly shrapnel embedded in it.

Granted. The shrapnel comes from an exploding grenade, which ruptures your heart. You die.

I wish for the next poster's head to explode.

Granted. However, the next poster comes back as an undead posting zombie even though it doesn't have a head.

I wish that Jool ate chocolate bars and pieces of rocket-steel.

Granted, but there is not enough of this sustenance to last even a day, and Jool falls into a depression. Later that week, it starves to death while tying a noose.

I wish Jool wasn't so sad </3

Granted. Jool becomes very angry and begins devouring its moons.

I wish this Otter Pop will stop freezing my lips because I'm holding it in my mouth so I can type.

Granted. You no longer have an Otter Pop. WTF is an Otter Pop?

I wish that I had a sword, a real, sharp, metal one. And that I don't accidentally hit myself with it.

Granted, but it's the size of a letter opener.

I wish I could juggle.

Granted. There are now no balls (JUGGLING balls, mind you) in the world.

I wish that my rockets were better than yours.

Edited March 22, 2014 by Zuni

Granted, but when you try to launch them your PC says nope and shuts down.

I wish Humble Bundle would bring out a brilliant bundle.

Granted, but it gives you a free Justin Beiber album with it.

I wish for an unusual hat.

Granted. You get a KSP Helmet, but its 02 valve is jammed and you suffocate to death.

I wish for sparklez.

Granted, but you take the word from Captainsparklez and his popularity on YouTube plummets.

I wish I understood Russian.

Granted, but everone in russia starts talking in french.

I wish for a comet.

Granted, but it's 7,000,000 light years away in another galaxy.

I wish for my heart's desire.

Edited March 22, 2014 by Zuni

Granted. You wish was to become nothing? So be it!

BEEP BEP

You "Beep" anytime you try to eat

I wish I could be able to mod

Granted. You could have been able to mod if you took 500 more modding lessons than as is normal.

I wish my computer monitor's support didn't look creepy anymore. (I can live with not having any computer monitor support)

Granted. Your computer's monitor support is no longer creepy, and is instead covered in pictures of Hello Kitty plushies.

I wish for banana milk.

Granted. However, bananas are not mammals, so you get an empty cup.

I wish for a full cup.

Granted, but it's full of Something weird that is in a shade of Eye-Bleeding Yellow

I wish for Oranges!

Granted, but they are a frightful shade of malevolent mauve. Upon touching one, you are instantly vaporised.

I wish for some harmless pet owls.

Granted, but your owls are killed by a rogue Killing Curse as you are escaping from He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named in a flying motorcycle.

I wish I could go to Hogwarts.

Granted, but you go as a Deatheater.

I wish I had a tasty non-coronary-killing cake

Granted. A bully snatches it just as you're about to munch.

I wish for a swimming pool full of kittens- ALIVE and HEALTHY kittens, not kitten gore!

Granted. You need to pay $100,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000 trillion dollars to access it.

I wish my shuttle actually glided well.
